The original release was nuked for having incorrect file name (scene rules), they then made a repack but the contents were identical to those they put out previously so that was nuked for being a duplicate of there own work. This is the first release, it works 100% so long as you install wave 15 before patching :)

i agree please boobsman or some one please give steps to patch this game pleaseeee i downloaded the wave 15 patch and  i still cant get it to work im lost HELP

@ Biggems22 its simple, download the waves from the abgx site, install using the instructions they provide, waves 1-13 have an installer but the others need to be done manually, then run the iso through as you would any other game. If your not on abgx 1.0.6 then you should update + make sure you have all waves (which you should have any way).

TPB will not let me add the link but just Google search abgx360 downloads get the 'Entire Video ISO archive' plus wave 15 from the bottom of the page, you only need 15 for this but its better to have all installed anyway.

If the above still does not work then you can patch the L1 video manually:

Make sure autofix is set to Level 3 Threshold

Then, click on the Manually Patch or Extract Files
Click the Patch Video. Browse to Video_F0420AFA.iso.

Run ABGX. Padding L0 Video will begin
Padding L1 Video Will begin

Abgx will finish, the game will still be unverified but the video will be fixed.

this game is ss1 not ss2 which is not safe to play on xbox.also this game isnt in the abgx database so it's not verified.there is a dead island game in abgx but it's not this one.this one comes up as different number and the one on abgx uses 12wave.not 15 wave like this one.so there is no way to get this particular one verified by abgx.plus this fails to autofix and fails to stealth check.cannot check l1 padding since iso is too small.keep in mind i have all the latest updates and have downloaded other games from boobsman with no problems.but this one comes up as a big problem.i have read what boobsman has said on here and he makes no sense.i8 have wave 15 installed on my stealth folders and it doesnt matter this game still will no verifiy  since it isnt in the abgx database.

@ lastjedi the info i have given above is for you to fix the L1 video file once you have wave 15 installed, for some reason some people are having trouble with patching this game since its a new wave format.

As for the game verification this is a new release and there is no verified copy in the abgx database, its NOT the same as the version already there so how can it be verified before its released in the shops? You'll need to wait until the game has been released and there's a shop brought copy in the database for abgx to verify against!
thanks @boobsman after patch video with 15 wave worked perfect

Works great . If your appdata file is hidden while you are browsing go to computer,organize,folder and search options, then in folder options click on small box View and choose Show Hidden files,folders,or drives. Thanks Boobsman. Thanks alot

Hey my names Jake and im 17 years old and I was wondering if anyone would be able to guide me in getting my xbox360 to play games of an external hard drive, and tell me the precautions i would have to take in doing so for example not using xbox live anymore. I would really appreciate anyones help because I am really stuck. Thanks

@ there are only 2 ways  to play games from a hard drive, either have a jtagged / RGH modded console so that you can play games from the xbox360's own hard drive or buy the x360 key and play the game iso's i upload from an external hard drive. Jtag or RGH modded consoles are not xbox live safe so you will not be able to play online, however with the x360 key you can use abgx360 to patch for online play, still not 100% safe but no worse than burning games to disc.

From LTJBukem (Demonoid) 

For ppl who are are still having problems patching with ABGX

Do this if ABGX is not finding the video partition on its own.... you can still select the video iso by using the method below

Make sure autofix is set to Level 3 Threshold

Then, click on the Manually Patch or Extract Files
Click the Patch Video. Browse to Video_F0420AFA.iso. (pending you read my earlier post and downloaded it - From the abgx360 site- download (very last file on the bottom)

Run ABGX. Padding L0 Video will begin
Padding L1 Video Will begin

Patch Successful and Play. Pretty straight forward.
